page.title: 09BUILDING AT DENBIGH HIGH.
page.content: We interviewed the headmaster of{ {Denbigh High School.}We asked him a selection of questions about the new buildings being built.Building began in{1975 }and is still continuing. Completion is due this year.The buildings which have been erected so far are a{design block,science lab, {kitchen,offices,library}and a{ {classroom}block.The buildings that are with process of being built are as follows:{three French rooms,three {Welsh rooms,two History rooms,library, {offices and careers office.}There will be a special{physiotherapy room}for the{physically handicapped pupils.}In this room there will be special toilets for disabled and a rest room if they get tired.Around the school will be ramps instead of steps.The next phase will include the building of a{sports centre.
